website_summaries.verdict: Though it lacks some of the bells and whistles of other models, if you need consistent sealing capabilities for big jobs, this could be for you.
pros: Ideal for preserving game and other fresh meats
Includes adapter cord, carrying handle, and ability to perform 80 consecutive seals
cons: Tends to leave air bubbles in the sealed bags, especially when sealing large cuts of meat
Fewer features than some others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sealer that works as fast I do
customer_reviews.text: Had this sealer a year now. It works as fast as I do with vac sealing 20-25 lbs of meat, sausage, and smoked fish at a time. All the other sealers I have had overheat and you have to wait several minutes to continue. I always wrap my meat in one layer of paper, a trick I learned from a meat cutter, to keep the moisture from being sucked out of the meat. May sound wasteful to some people but I am very particular about the quality of my meat. It also prevents perforations of the bags by bones during the vac process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check out your product right away, Don't wait till you need it. It may not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third vacuum sealer, i bought this one because my first two worked so well and my husband wanted this Big game saver vacuum sealer. unfortunately this one has a defect that the other Big Game saver did not have. This one does not seal and he did not look at it until a few weeks ago so the return warranty is passed. So we can not return it. So Buyer beware, check out your product. I wish we had, its just that we had the other two that worked so well. I did not use it because we has no need.
customer_reviews.author: Gongbeach

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE WAITING FOR THE HEAT STRIP TO COOL!!
customer_reviews.text: NO MORE WAITING FOR THE HEAT STRIP TO COOL!!! This unit is worth the money - just so you don't have to wait for the seal strip to cool down. I package a huge amount of dry products for storage and will sometimes use this unit for 2-3 hours without stopping. It does the job and then some. Not one issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: texas effect

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of my old sealer overheating and wanted something to seal multiple bags in a row. It did just what I wanted. Only thing you need to know is this will not seal in cold temps. I took mine on a trip to Idaho 20-40 degrees and it wouldn't work. I figured out if I put it in my truck window in the sun or heated it up on the inside of my truck cab it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Drumond

customer_reviews.title: but just like the automatic version
customer_reviews.text: I came from the automatic foodsaver which was honestly way easier to use but had one major flaw, it could not seal anything wet. The reason for that was that the automatic one released the vacuum as soon as its done "sealing", fail. Since you control the lock on this one, you can leave it under vacuum and just press seal again to get a double seal and finally seal wet foods! Yeah its slower, and a pain to use, but it works. Its also portable which is a plus. I thought that this one would do continuous seals (no waiting), but just like the automatic version, you still have to wait 10 seconds before itll go again. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: blind_skwirl

customer_reviews.title: Gaskets go bad and can't get replacements
customer_reviews.text: The gaskets are foam and go bad. They get juices in them eventually and you need to replace them. Finding the upper and lower replacements are crazy hard to get. Tried an aftermarket replacement set and they don't work. Tried to contact foodsaver and they want pictures of the unit along with literally like 15 sets of numbers off it. Way too much hassle for some $5 gaskets that should be available. I'm just ditching the unit and buying another brand at this point.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We have tried to order this twice, both times neither of them work. I can't understand why we keep getting sent defective ones when this product gets such good reviews. No lights, no sounds...nothing.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett_scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I used this 5 or 6 times and it has already quit. You would think for the price that it would last several years.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: ITS JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dec of 2019 and it is completely DEAD as of Sept 20. And it's coming up on deer season here. No problem, it comes with a 2 year warranty. However their customer service is non-existent! For the last month I've gotten the same worthless "sorry for the slow response tell us what's wrong" email responses from their customer service dept. it is garbage! It's clunky to use and slow to recycle when you really need it. Very disappointing piece of trash. I'm throwing it out and no more foodsaver products for me. Be warned DONT BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: This sealer worked great for the first 3 times I used it. After the third time, the cutting mechanism completely fails to make a clean cut, the suction capacity has decreased and I am unable to get a complete seal across the bag, thus letting air in and defeating the purpose of the product. I was going to attempt an exchange, but I am outside my return window. I am extremely disappointed with the overall performance of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Got a good price on it.
customer_reviews.text: Good food saver. This thing is pretty big and has a big foot print. It comes with 2 gallon sized bags and 3 quart size bags. It also comes with a roll so you can make your own size. The unit itself is easy to use and after watching some youtube videos, it is pretty easy to understand and self explanatory to use and setup. I use it to package kim chi to ship out to friends and family. Price on here is cheaper than other places. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best FoodSaver Vacuum Sealer for Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally give 5 Star Ratings, but I think this product, a vacuum food sealer, is very well designed, and I'm using it for home/kitchen use for most of my food preservation needs. I did buy the FoodSaver v2244, a low-cost unit, but I decided to spend the extra money at about $140 for this GameSaver unit instead and returned the low-cost v2244. I think I made a very wise decision, because this unit is far superior and well made. Buy this for home/kitchen use. The only "design issue" is you do need more counter space with this unit, because it is wider than other units.
customer_reviews.author: Cast Iron Chef

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. I’ve had 3 food savers over the years and this has to be the worse of all of them. After 3 bags it quit sealing properly. Wasted another 3 bags trying to seal 1 pack of chicken. Turns out if it’s the least bit wet it will not seal properly. Better off using ziplock bags and save yourself the time and money. Thought this rugged version would be a little more stout and hold up longer, I was way off. This will be my last time getting a food saver product, very disappointing to say the least. Couldn’t get through 1 meat order.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cousino

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. I have had this for over 6 months and have used it less than 10 times. The seal now does not work. I contacted the manufacturer and getting a replacement is like pulling teeth. I would be so happy if replacing the part was easier. I am not saying don't buy it but be aware replacing the seal may turn into a pain. Insert sad face
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: No offense, but this product was nothing but a huge bulky piece of junk!!! My husband literally used this thing 1 time, it quit working, and wouldn’t power up again. I wouldn’t recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Fastest sealer out there.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since 2016 and it’s December of 2019 now. I’ve literally packed over 1000 pounds of deer, and fish. This thing is faster than anything out there. I can’t believe there’s any reviews that aren’t 5. I would assume they don’t know how to use it. Lots of tricks to keep juices out of the seal etc...you learn as you go. Just did 3 deer on a trip this month. I’ve used food saver bags and other brands, all of them work good....only issue is when the bags have wrinkles when they are wrapped, but you can still use them, you just have to be careful and stretch them across.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lock and load
customer_reviews.text: It does everything they say it will do. I bought this one as a replacement. The ONLY complaint I have with the Foodsaver systems is the locking mechanisms. They don't last long. They really need to design them with better materials. They break or get faulty fairly quick. But as far as a food storage, you can't go wrong. I've been using the system for close to 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hunters and fishermen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for outdoorsy son at Christmas. Hopefully “Bambi Gutting” and fish cleaning will now take place out in the forest instead of my suburban backyard :) Bonus: runs off car cig lighter!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: This Doesnt Suck!
customer_reviews.text: Well, unfortunately it doesn't have near the suction power for the chinese brand one I had for 5yrs at half the cost. But it does have good options I have found to be convenient but still disappointed in the suction!
customer_reviews.author: JAY CAL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a friend had one and said it has lasted them for years. I am very impressed with it and hope it last as long as theirs have! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm, and as promised.
customer_reviews.text: The Sealer does everything it promises to. It's quick easy to use, has great suction power, easy to clean up. You can do bag after bag without it having to cool down. It's fairly quick as well! I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail N.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it didn’t...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great....for just about 6 months. We’ve owned a couple FoodSaver products and have been happy. This one is quick, simple, and cools fast. Had 2 bags to seal tonight...first one made a strange noise, and now it won’t turn on. Definitely not “big game” worthy. I’d love to exchange it. Maybe we just got a bad one!
customer_reviews.author: Randee A.

customer_reviews.title: Great fish and game sealer
customer_reviews.text: With this sealer the bags STAY vacuum sealed. Wrap fish & game with cling wrap to prevent freezer burn. Am pleased
customer_reviews.author: jim murray

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a previous model that we loved. This one works just as good. The large size is a plus. We buy in bulk because of our rural location an only go shopping once a month on avarage. So this is a money saver.
customer_reviews.author: Tabi

customer_reviews.title: So far so good it has a lot of suction
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2017 use it a lot and it works good. Has a ton of suction, only flaw I have found is when vacuum sealing things that have liquid you have to do the final seal twice but on a dry bag works great. I looked at vacuum sealers a while before getting this one. If you are in question look at YouTube to help you with your decision.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: slim works great
customer_reviews.text: works very well. Vacuums and seal very fast. do be aware that this is a compact machine and will not hold the large bulk roll of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Seems Sturdy...so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, apply slight pressure when in vacuum mode, for best results. Love that it's portable and has 12v car power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Temkin

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many folks out there make their own deer sausage but if you are away from home at "deer camp". You can use your truck battery to power up this machine. Fast and reliable, happy vacuum sealing to y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal Jasper

customer_reviews.title: FoodSaver Vacuum Sealer GM710-000 GameSaver Big Game Sealing System
customer_reviews.text: It works well. We vacuum seal fish we catch throughout the summer. Saves space in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hen

customer_reviews.title: DOA won't heat up the sealing strip
customer_reviews.text: DOA Would not heat up. Same as the one I was replacing. So that got me looking at my old one after I returned this one for refund. I found an interlock switch that makes contact when the lid closes. Once this switch is made, the heating element will heat up. Otherwise, the unit senses the lid is not tight closed and the heater doesn't kick on and the the cycle is abandoned. I superglued an extension onto the probe in the lid that makes contact with the switch on my old unit and it now works! I can't say for sure this replacement for my old unit has the same problem, but it's suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Pro 3

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good sealer, average vacuum power, capable of sealing meat and quantity, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trekaychris

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this from our registry. We used it to can some salsa with ingredients we had from our garden. It’s easy to use and I also bought it so my husband can use it on hand if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good for field not for house
customer_reviews.text: This is to be used in the field not in the home. If you want one for your house get the better one
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the three good savers and this one is by far the best! The others had issues with having to cool down after a few seals or didn't always seal on the first try. This one seals time after time, no issues. It removes all of the air so I won't worry about freezer burn. It is durable and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: love this for sealing meat
customer_reviews.text: It seals the meat very nicely. No more ice on the meat or freezer burn. the bags are expensive
customer_reviews.author: Elvira T. Szedny

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Promises
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't wimp out when you are sealing pounds and baskets of hard earned bounty. Easy to clean, easy to transport, easy to store (hang it on a wall). The accessory cord allows it to be used at the deer camp or fishing trip. It protects other valuables also like documents and jewelry. It's a worker!
customer_reviews.author: Delighted Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple other sealers and this one is easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Helps to save from freezer burn.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Wachter

customer_reviews.title: Used for packaging tuna, tilefish, and cod after ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for packaging tuna, tilefish, and cod after offshore trips. Packaged venison after deer season. This lets me do it all right on my tailgate using the car adapter. Has held up well for several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick JD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 6 deer that I got this past season. Worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Barth

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: foodsaver has terrible quality control. DOA right out of the box. I will be looking for another brand, and you should too!
customer_reviews.author: wade shockley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use and would recommend buying .
customer_reviews.author: Joann Sive

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: Great unit..loved it. Except it died after using maybe 3 or 4 times (had it 2 mos total). Hard to fall in love with something & then have it puke. Amazon is taking it back but don't think I'll try another of this type....
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Kettel

customer_reviews.title: Game processing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We process our own game and it is holding up well. We processed 4 deer at one time. It never had to cool down between seals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want another one
customer_reviews.text: I packed a whole elk with this one machine the bags go along way in the machine did not overheat he did everything that I asked her to do and more .
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lial

customer_reviews.title: Came fast and in good order. The first time we used it we ...
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and in good order. The first time we used it we vacuumed and sealed 80 pounds of chicken breasts at one time and it worked great and flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Love it for vacuum sealing jars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a time now, and noticed at times after sealing bags air does get into the bag. So not sure if it is the foodsaver unit itself, or the bags? Love it for vacuum sealing jars.
customer_reviews.author: whisperingwinds

customer_reviews.title: Worth every oenny
customer_reviews.text: Love the 12v feature for hunting trips. Super easy to use and I also like the storage setting instead of having it locked down like previous models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It seems very durable, nice having the roll on the machine. Have used several times already sealing fish, deer, and hog meat. Will suggest it to my friends when they need one.
customer_reviews.author: Skritty

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this item to vacuum seal 6 bags. Simple to use. The only con is the sealing isn't top notch, you kind of have to push down on the product inside of the bag slightly to get it to seal very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Some time it, some times it don’t
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased this unit, I had some trouble with it not holding a seal after 1 day of sealing some bags. Not all of them sealed probably. I’m going to trying following some of the tips to see if it make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce  Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't even last a year, we bought it Dec 2017! We would mostly use this during hunting season and it was great while it lasted but for the money it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AskCord

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it happens to all of them but it doesn't like to seal in one spot unless you push it down with your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Garcia

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing to not like with this model. I have gone through 5 other foodsaver's in 18 years. wanted one a lot more heavy duty and this baby delivers beyond what could ask for. the price is $100.00 cheaper than Walmarts. thank you again for the deal I got on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: kaweka kealoa

customer_reviews.title: Working nice
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old unit with this one and has been working good

customer_reviews.title: Does not suck all the air out of the bags
customer_reviews.text: Does not suck all the air out of the bags. Lots of freezer burned food. Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well. I have had a few bags not ...
customer_reviews.text: works pretty well. I have had a few bags not seal and had to reseal them. It seems to be a good machine for a decent price.

customer_reviews.text: This FoodSaver Vacuum Sealer is very easy to use and, it performs as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Descent vacuum sealer
customer_reviews.text: Work good. Have only used a handful of times. I hope it holds up. Have not tried it in 12v yet

customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without my machine.always love this product specially this model. This is me second one.

customer_reviews.title: Two stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Two of these just stopped working! They both just stopped and do absolutely nothing. Look elsewhere!

customer_reviews.title: I like the controls
customer_reviews.text: pump is weak, often leaving air in the package. I like the controls, bag cutting, layout and easy operation of this one. My older model was automatic start and caused issues. I just wish this one had the same power as my older one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Operate and a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great gift and will get a lot of use during hunting & gardening seasons

customer_reviews.title: worked great. love the locking mechanism in lieu of the ...
customer_reviews.text: had a professional that lasted for 17 years......saw they can refurbish, but the parts aren't around. so I just decide to get a new one. worked great. love the locking mechanism in lieu of the mechanical closure on the old professional. I hope this last another 17 years. get one if your a hunter, fisherman or one that buys large quantities of food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th food saver. I like the simplicity of this one. Also I don't have to let it cool down when putting up quantities of meat.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice vacuum sealer. It works really nice

customer_reviews.title: I packaged a whole pig with this model. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I packaged a whole pig with this model. The performance was satisfactory for ground sausage, but the vacuum was simply not strong enough for the packages with large bones. It left a lot of air at the bottom of the bag. I have an older model which seemed to be much more powerful. The lock on the machine slowed me down when doing a large quantity of packaging, but I got used to it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Spitznogle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foodsaver! This is the easiest to use! I've been using it for a couple of months, and so far no issues!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Suck enough, whimpy!
customer_reviews.text: No suction, weak unit. I heard it was a good unit, but was misled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this model.
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 of these machine's in 4 months, both of them crapped the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Crap, sealed 4 times then made click noise and died...very dissatisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Cobb

product_meta.title: FoodSaver Vacuum Sealer GM710-000 GameSaver Big Game Sealing System, reg, Black
product_meta.description: Created with hunters, fishermen, and outdoor enthusiasts in mind, the FoodSaver GameSaver Big Game Vacuum Sealing System features an updated, rugged design with integrated carrying handle and large, rubberized buttons. This new design has intelligent sealing control that lets you do up to 80 consecutive seals or up to 240 pounds of food, and includes a bonus 15-foot 12V power cord, extra-large drip tray and built-in storage compartment. Preserve your prize game and prevent freezer burn.
feature_bullets: HARD-EARNED GAME STAYS FRESH LONGER: The GameSaver Vacuum Sealing System removes air from specially designed bags, then applies heat so it seals meat, fish, and poultry airtight to prevent freezer burn and spoilage
HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION: High-performance power processes and preserves faster with up to 80 consecutive seals or 240 pounds

CONVENIENCE GRAB & GO DESIGN: Rugged carry handle, 12-volt DC adaptor, and built-in storage compartment for the Fresh Handheld Sealer make it convenient to power up and preserve from autos, boats, and RVs
RUGGED DESIGN: Large, rubber, non-slip buttons ensure efficient operation in the field or in the kitchen
Includes (1) 11” x 10’ heat seal roll, (1) 8” x 10’ heat seal roll, (5) 1-quart pre-cut heat seal bags, (5) 1-gallon pre-cut heat seal bags, and (1) accessory hose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars483 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
